name: Reverse Me! 2 Rose (Mia Blais-Côté) (Mia Blais-Côté)
description: The second of the “Reverse me!” trilogy. Inspired by the fairy tale of “Snow-White and Rose-Red”, Reverse Me! 2 Rose is the story of two sisters, a bear and an ungrateful dwarf.  Dual Language Story and User Interface. Both English and French appears at the same time. Kinetic Novel.
